items.title: Increasing the dosage
items.description: If you’re taking the wrong medication, that’s not going to help. It doesn’t matter how fast you’re going if you’re headed in the wrong direction.

items.title: Before we learn a new skill
items.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.
